name: Knuckles-Warfare
description:
A small 2D topdown shooter game about surviving from waves of uganda knuckles. This is the first unity project that I have ever made so it's not that good, I did most of everything by myself like coding and animating but sounds, for the most part, I have to download from open source sites.

I hope you enjoy this because this was quite a ride for me making this, I start with knowing barely anything but I'm quite proud of how it turns out.
